definitions.title: vb. denom.
definitions.body: (Gerber:20) be, or act as, prince, rule;—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיׇּ֫שַׂר עַל־]] [[יִשְׂרָאֵל]] Ju Jdg 9:22 Abim. ruled over Isr. three years; 3 mpl. [[יׇשָׂרוּ]]…[[שָׂרִים]]: Is 32:1 princes shall govern (prince it) justly (‖[[יִטְלָח־מֶלֶךְ ]]), cf. Pr 8:16; Pt. [[שׂרֵר]] …[[לִהְיוֹת]]: Es 1:22 that every man should bear rule [[בְּבֵיתוֹ]].

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf., 2 ms. + Inf. abs. [[כִּי־תִשְׂתָּרֵר עָלֵינוּ גַּם־הִשְׂתָּרֵר]] Nu 16:13 that thou shouldst also keep playing the prince over us.—[[יׇסׂר]] 1Ch 15:22 v. [[יׇסַר]]

definitions.title: 4 b. Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. metapl. [[הֵשִׂירוּ]] (Ges:§ 67 v) Ho 8:4 they made princes (abs.; ‖[[הִמְלִיכוּ]]). p. 415f, 978
